title: Fruit 66
sectionheader: A fresh new blend of cooking and driving chaos!
sectionembed: <iframe style="position:absolute;top:0;left:0;bottom:0;right:0;width:100%;height:100%;" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/oov75UIlpZw" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>
sectiondesc:
Brace yourself for an epic challenge as you juggle the art of cooking, the thrill of reckless driving, and the pressure of timely deliveries through bite-sized levels that are sure to get your adrenaline pumping! 

You're at the helm of a shiny new smoothie-slinging food truck on the wild and scenic highway Fruit 66, with a burning desire to fund your dream and expand your business of on-the-road smoothie delivery. 
Jump behind the wheel, fire up the blender, and let the chaos begin!
